about.text1: Hi!ðŸ‘‹ My name is Alonso Crespo FernÃ¡ndez. Since I was young, I have had a strong attraction to computer science. I was fascinated by understanding how computers worked, taking them apart, and tinkering on my own. This initial curiosity eventually turned into a true passion that drove me to learn and train in the technological field.
about.text2: Finally, passionate about developing innovative and effective solutions, I trained as a Computer Engineer. I stand out for my ability to tackle complex problems with a structured approach, always prioritizing quality and functionality in the projects I develop. My commitment to continuous learning and excellence drives me to face new challenges with enthusiasm and creativity.
